RANDIMG(6D)                                         RANDIMG(6D)





NAME
       randimg - generate a noise image

SYNOPSIS
       randimg outimage xsize ysize [seed]

DESCRIPTION
       randimg makes an image of random noise. Seed initializes
       the random number generator. A seed  value  of  0  makes
       randimg use its process id as the seed.

SEE ALSO
       addnoise(6D)



IRIX 6.5                  May 5, 2004               RANDIMG(6D)
